item.title: ‘He thinks nothing of spending $40K on a new car’: My husband gives me the silent treatment. How can we agree on finances?
item.description: “I’m looking for a financial planner, marriage counselor and, possibly, a divorce attorney.”

item.title: I want to escape the U.S. political climate and be a ‘digital nomad’ abroad. I’m 46 and earn $98,000 — how can I do this?
item.description: “My ideal situation is probably to live and travel abroad for nine months out of the year and be in the U.S. for about three months.”

item.title: ‘He’s the breadwinner’: Does my husband take Social Security at 66 — or get $800 extra at 70?
item.description: “My husband jokes that he will never be able to retire because we do not own a home.”

item.title: Why fewer seniors are expected to enroll in Medicare Advantage next year — and opt for original Medicare instead
item.description: Medicare Advantage may be less attractive for seniors next year — and its market share could suffer.

item.title: I’m 64, have $1.2 million in a 401(k) and two mortgages. Can I afford to retire?
